main_definition: Being pleasant, kind, or agreeable in nature.

meanings_and_examples.example: She has a nice personality that everyone enjoys being around.
He gave me the benefit of the doubt when he assumed I was telling the truth.
The view from my new apartment is absolutely stunning and very nice!
This software has a really nice interface that makes it easy for me to navigate.
The host was very nice and made sure everyone had something to eat and drink.
